component.name: listIdentities
component.description: Returns a list containing all of the identities.

component.name: listIdentityDkimAttributes
component.description: Returns the current status of Easy DKIM signing for an entity.

component.name: listIdentityNotificationAttributes
component.description: Given a list of verified identities.

component.name: setIdentityDkimEnabled
component.description: Enables or disables Easy DKIM signing of email sent from an identity.

component.name: setIdentityFeedbackForwardingEnabled
component.description: Enables or disables whether Amazon SES forwards bounce and complaint notifications as email.

component.name: setIdentityNotificationTopic
component.description: Sets the Amazon Simple Notification Service.
